main_definition: Kinds refers to different types, varieties or categories of something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Various forms or types of the same thing.
meanings_and_examples.example: There are many kinds of flowers in my garden.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Different groups or categories within a larger group.
meanings_and_examples.example: She sorted her books into different kinds based on their genres.
There are many kinds of dogs, such as Labradors and Poodles.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Kinds can also be used informally to mean a small number or amount.
meanings_and_examples.example: I bought three kinds of apples at the market today.
